sentences.sContent: Kennedy’s predecessor as President was the war hero Dwight Eisenhower.
sentences.sCn: 肯尼迪总统的前任是战争英雄德怀特·艾森豪威尔。

exam.question: His use of color, light and form quickly departed from the conventional style of his ______ as he developed his own technique.

answer.explain: 句意： 他对色彩、 光线和形式的运用不落俗套， 超越前人， 形成了自己的技艺。descendant： 子孙， 后裔； successor： 继承者， 接任者； ancestor： 祖先， 祖宗。

remMethod.val: pre(前) ＋ de(下去) ＋ cess(走) ＋ or(表人) → 前面走下去的人 → 前辈

trans.tranOther: someone who had your job before you started doing it
